room_title: Escape room "Project Poseidon" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
room_address: 4437 W Flamingo Rd. Las Vegas, NV 89103
room_description:
You have been recruited by the Department of Metaphysical Enterprises to carry out a Top Secret operation. As the heads of your fields, we are entrusting your team to investigate the work of Dr. Ian and the creation of his machine of questionable origin. The mission and any intel you acquire is to remain CLASSIFIED and on a strictly need to know basis. Find out what Dr. Ian was working on and assess any dangers the machine may pose to the organizationâ€¦ and possibly even the Earth itself.
Welcome to Project Poseidon.
